featured.text: We weren’t able to visit the Rainbow Waterfalls as we planned, but… John

definition.zh_def: 瀑布是水流從高處垂直或斜向下降的自然現象。
definition.en_def: Waterfalls are natural features where water flows over a vertical drop or cliff.
definition.example: The sound of the waterfalls was soothing as we hiked through the forest.
